Chinese.name: ZIP包解压
Chinese.description: 本示例通过配置COS触发，上传到COS的ZIP包，使用SCF下载并本地解压，支持带密码解压，支持中文字段解压，并把解压后的文件上传到COS另一个bucket中，您还可以扩充支持RAR包的解压。
Chinese.attention: 该云函数需要配置 COS 触发器，另外在使用本示例代码时需要在函数里修改 appid、secret_id、secret_key、需要接收解压后文件的bucket、压缩包的解压密码。

English.name: UnzipToCOS
English.description: This demo need to config COS trigger. When ZIP has been upload to COS bucket, the SCF will download it to /tmp and unzip it.
English.attention: You should config COS trigger before you use it. Please change the appid,secret_id,secret_key,password of zip.
